src/tracadv.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*
00002  *                                                                    *
00003  *        3-dimensional offline tracer advection routine              *
00004  *            David Darr - October 2002/February 2003                 *
00005  *                                                                    *
00006  ********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*/
00007 
00008 
00009 #include <stdio.h>
00010 #include <stdlib.h>
00011 #include <string.h>
00012 #include <math.h>

00016 #include "offtrac.h"

00019 static double dmax1, dmax2, dmin1, dmin2;
00020 #define D_MAX(a,b) (dmax1=(a),dmax2=(b),((dmax1) > (dmax2)) ?\
00021                    (dmax1) : (dmax2))
00022 #define D_MIN(a,b) (dmin1=(a),dmin2=(b),((dmin1) < (dmin2)) ?\
00023                    (dmin1) : (dmin2))
00024 
00025 extern double dt;
00026 extern double h[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];      /* Layer thickness, begin of advec step in m.  */
00027 
00028 extern double hstart[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* Layer thickness, begin of advec step in m.  */
00029 
00030 extern double hend[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* Layer thickness, end of advec step in m.  */
00031 #ifdef HTEST
00032 extern double htest[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];  /* Layer thickness, used for debugging  */
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 extern double ****tr; /* Tracer concentration g m-3.*/
00036 extern double           D[NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* Basin depth, in m.         */
00037 
00038 extern double ***uhtm; /* uhtm and the vhtm are the sum */
00039 extern double ***vhtm; /* of uh and vh between tracer   */
00040                     /* updates, both in m3 s-1.      */
00041 
00042 extern double umask[NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* _mask are 1 over ocean and 0  */
00043 extern double vmask[NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* over land on the u & v grids. */
00044 
00045 extern double ***ea;
00046 extern double ***eb;
00047 extern double eaml[NXMEM][NYMEM];
00048 extern double wd[NZ+1][NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* the diapycnal velocity that is */
00049                                       /* calculated at the interfaces   */
00050 extern char directory2[95];          /* The directory to use to save  */
00051                                      /* output files.                 */
00052 
00053 #if defined(PARALLEL_X) || defined(PARALLEL_Y)
00054 extern int pe_here;                  /* The current processor's label.*/
00055 #else
00056 #define pe_here 0                    /* Without running in parallel,  */
00057                                      /* the current processor is 0.   */
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #ifdef PARALLEL_X
00061 extern int nx;                       /* The number of x-points in the */
00062                                      /* physical domain calculated by */
00063                                      /* the current processor.        */
00064 #endif
00065 #ifdef PARALLEL_Y
00066 extern int ny;                       /* The number of y-points in the */
00067                                      /* physical domain calculated by */
00068                                      /* the current processor.        */
00069 #endif

00091 static void tracer_hordiff(void);
00092 void print_tr(int pstage);
00093 void hvol_integral(double ***hvol);
00094 void hvol_kintegral(int k, double ***hvol);
00095 void tracer_integral(int trnum, double ***hvol);
00096 void tracer_kintegral(int trnum, int k, double ***hvol);
00097 
00098 void tracer(int itts)
00099 {
00100 
00101 /*    This subroutine time steps the tracer concentration.            */
00102 /*  A positive definite scheme is used.                               */
00103 
00104 
00105   double minslope;          /* The maximum concentration slope per    */
00106                             /* grid point consistent with mono-       */
00107                             /* tonicity, in conc. (nondim.).          */
00108 
00109   double ***hvol; /* The cell volume of an h-element   */
00110 
00111   double slope[NXMEM+NYMEM][NTR]; /* The concentration slope per grid */
00112                         /* point in units of concentration (nondim.). */
00113   double fluxtr[NXMEM+NYMEM][NTR];/* The flux of tracer across a      */
00114                         /* boundary, in m3 * conc. (nondim.).         */
00115 
00116 
00117   double ***uhr; /* The remaining zonal and meridional */
00118   double ***vhr; /* thickness fluxes, in m3.*/
00119 
00120   double uhh[NXMEM];        /* uhh and vhh are the reduced fluxes     */
00121   double vhh[NYMEM];        /* during the current iteration, in m3.d  */
00122 
00123   double hup, hlos;         /* hup is the upwind volume, hlos is the  */
00124                             /* part of that volume that might be lost */
00125                             /* due to advection out the other side of */
00126                             /* the grid box, both in m3.              */
00127   double ts2;
00128   double landvolfill;       /* An arbitrary? nonzero cell volume, m3. */
00129 
00130   double ***ear;
00131   double ***ebr;
00132   double ***wdh;
00133   
00134   double bet[NXMEM];        /* bet and gam are variables used by the  */
00135   double gam[NZ][NXMEM];    /* tridiagonal solver.                    */
00136   double hnew0[NXMEM];      /* The original topmost layer thickness,  */
00137 #if defined AGE2 || defined AGE3
00138   //  extern double hnew[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00139   extern double ***hnew;
00140 #else
00141   double ***hnew;
00142 #endif
00143 
00144 //  double MLMIN = EPSILON;   /* min depth for ML                             */
00145 
00146         double MLMIN = 4.25;
00147         double BLMIN = 0.20;
00148 
00149 #ifdef ENTRAIN
00150   double nts = dt/DT; /* number of timesteps (#day*86400/3600seconds) */
00151 #endif
00152   int i, j, k, m, pstage;
00153   int itt;
00154   double fract1;
00155   double fract2;
00156 # ifdef WRTTS
00157   double wrts;
00158 # endif
00159 
00160   hvol = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00161     if(hvol == NULL) {
00162         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for hvol!\n");
00163     }
00164   uhr = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00165     if(uhr == NULL) {
00166         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for uhr!\n");
00167     }
00168   vhr = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00169     if(vhr == NULL) {
00170         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for vhr!\n");
00171     }
00172   ear = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00173     if(ear == NULL) {
00174         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for ear!\n");
00175     }
00176   ebr = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00177     if(ebr == NULL) {
00178         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for ebr!\n");
00179     }
00180   wdh = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00181     if(wdh == NULL) {
00182         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for wdh!\n");
00183     }
00184 #if !defined AGE2 && !defined AGE3
00185   hnew = alloc3d(NZ,NXMEM,NYMEM);
00186     if(hnew == NULL) {
00187         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for hnew!\n");
00188     }
00189 #endif
00190 
00191     landvolfill = EPSILON*1000000.0;    /* This is arbitrary.   */
00192 
00193                 /* zonal re-entrance            */
00194 
00195     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00196       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00197         uhtm[k][nx+1][j] = uhtm[k][2][j];
00198         uhtm[k][nx+2][j] = uhtm[k][3][j];
00199         uhtm[k][0][j] =   uhtm[k][nx-1][j];
00200         uhtm[k][1][j] =   uhtm[k][nx][j];
00201         vhtm[k][nx+1][j] = vhtm[k][2][j];
00202         vhtm[k][nx+2][j] = vhtm[k][3][j];
00203         vhtm[k][0][j] =   vhtm[k][nx-1][j];
00204         vhtm[k][1][j] =   vhtm[k][nx][j];
00205       }
00206       for (k=0;k<NZ+1;k++) {
00207         wd[k][nx+1][j] = wd[k][2][j];
00208         wd[k][nx+2][j] = wd[k][3][j];
00209         wd[k][0][j] =   wd[k][nx-1][j];
00210         wd[k][1][j] =   wd[k][nx][j];
00211       }
00212     }
00213 
00214         /* meridional re-entrance            */
00215 
00216     for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
00217       int ii = 363 - i;
00218       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00219         uhtm[k][ii][ny+1] = (-1)*uhtm[k][i][ny];
00220         uhtm[k][ii][ny+2] = (-1)*uhtm[k][i][ny-1];
00221         vhtm[k][ii][ny+1] = (-1)*vhtm[k][i][ny];
00222         vhtm[k][ii][ny+2] = (-1)*vhtm[k][i][ny-1];
00223       }
00224        for (k=0;k<NZ+1;k++) {
00225         wd[k][ii][ny+1] = wd[k][i][ny];
00226         wd[k][ii][ny+2] = wd[k][i][ny-1];
00227       }
00228     }
00229 
00230 
00231 
00232   for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)  {
00233 /*  Put the thickness fluxes into uhr and vhr.                  */
00234     for (j=0;j<=ny+2;j++) {
00235         for (i=0;i<=nx+2;i++) {
00236 
00237             uhr[k][i][j] = uhtm[k][i][j]*dt;
00238             vhr[k][i][j] = vhtm[k][i][j]*dt;
00239 
00240             if (h[k][i][j] < EPSILON) {
00241                 h[k][i][j] = 1.0*EPSILON;
00242             }
00243 
00244 /*   This line calculates the cell volume                       */
00245         hvol[k][i][j] = DXDYh(i,j)*h[k][i][j];
00246         hnew[k][i][j] = h[k][i][j];
00247       }
00248     }
00249   }
00250 
00251 /* calculate the diapycnal velocities at the interfaces         */
00252 /*   if we read in the ea, eb and eaml variables                */
00253 /*   Otherwise we read in wd directly                           */
00254 
00255 #ifdef ENTRAIN
00256   for (i=X0;i<=nx+1;i++)                               
00257       for (j=Y0;j<=ny;j++)
00258         wd[0][i][j] = nts*eaml[i][j];                        
00259 
00260   for (k=1;k<NZ;k++)                              
00261       for (i=X0;i<=nx+1;i++)
00262           for (j=Y0;j<=ny;j++)
00263               wd[k][i][j] = nts*(ea[k][i][j] - eb[k-1][i][j]); 
00264 #endif
00265 
00266 #define STANDARD_ADVECTION
00267 //#undef STANDARD_ADVECTION
00268 #ifdef STANDARD_ADVECTION
00269     /*
00270     pstage=1;
00271     print_tr(pstage);
00272     */
00273 
00274   /* beginning of itt loop */
00275     for (itt = 0; itt < NUM_ADV_ITER; itt++) {
00276         printf(" Advection iteration %d/%d\n",itt+1,NUM_ADV_ITER);
00277       /* big loop over k         */
00278       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00279 
00280         { 
00281 /*    To insure positive definiteness of the thickness at each        */
00282 /*  iteration, the mass fluxes out of each layer are checked each     */
00283 /*  time.  This may not be very efficient, but it should be reliable. */
00284 
00285 /* ============================================================ */
00286 /*                      first advect zonally                    */
00287 /* ============================================================ */
00288 
00289           for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00290 
00291 /*   Calculate the i-direction profiles (slopes) of each tracer that  */
00292 /* is being advected.                                                 */
00293             for (i=X0;i<=nx+1;i++) {
00294 
00295               for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00296                 minslope = 4.0*((fabs(tr[m][k][i+1][j]-tr[m][k][i][j]) < 
00297                                  fabs(tr[m][k][i][j]-tr[m][k][i-1][j])) ? 
00298                                 (tr[m][k][i+1][j]-tr[m][k][i][j]) :
00299                                 (tr[m][k][i][j]-tr[m][k][i-1][j]));
00300                 slope[i][m] = umask[i][j]*umask[i-1][j] *
00301                   (((tr[m][k][i+1][j]-tr[m][k][i][j]) * 
00302                     (tr[m][k][i][j]-tr[m][k][i-1][j]) < 0.0) ? 0.0 :
00303                    ((fabs(tr[m][k][i+1][j]-tr[m][k][i-1][j])<fabs(minslope)) ?
00304                     0.5*(tr[m][k][i+1][j]-tr[m][k][i-1][j]) : 0.5*minslope));
00305               }
00306             }
00307 
00308 /*   Calculate the i-direction fluxes of each tracer, using as much   */
00309 /* the minimum of the remaining mass flux (uhr) and the half the mass */
00310 /* in the cell plus whatever part of its half of the mass flux that   */
00311 /* the flux through the other side does not require.                  */
00312 
00313             for (i=X0;i<=nx;i++) {
00314               if (uhr[k][i][j] == 0.0) {
00315                 uhh[i] = 0.0;
00316                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) fluxtr[i][m] = 0.0;
00317               }
00318               else if (uhr[k][i][j] < 0.0) {
00319 
00320                 if (k==0 || k==1 ) {
00321                   hup = (hvol[k][i+1][j]-DXDYh(i+1,j)*MLMIN);
00322                 } else {
00323                   hup = (hvol[k][i+1][j]-DXDYh(i+1,j)*EPSILON);
00324                 }
00325 
00326                 hlos = D_MAX(0.0,uhr[k][i+1][j]);
00327                 if (((hup + uhr[k][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) && 
00328                     ((0.5*hup + uhr[k][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00329                   uhh[i] = D_MIN(-0.5*hup,-hup+hlos);
00330                 }
00331                 else uhh[i] = uhr[k][i][j];
00332                 ts2 = 0.5*(1.0 + uhh[i]/hvol[k][i+1][j]);
00333                 
00334                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00335                   fluxtr[i][m] = uhh[i]*(tr[m][k][i+1][j] - slope[i+1][m]*ts2);
00336                 }
00337               }
00338               else {
00339 
00340                 if (k==0 || k==1 ) {
00341                   hup = (hvol[k][i][j]-DXDYh(i,j)*MLMIN);
00342                 } else {
00343                   hup = (hvol[k][i][j]-DXDYh(i,j)*EPSILON);
00344                 }
00345 
00346                 hlos = D_MAX(0.0,-uhr[k][i-1][j]);
00347                 if (((hup - uhr[k][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) && 
00348                     ((0.5*hup - uhr[k][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00349                   uhh[i] = D_MAX(0.5*hup,hup-hlos);
00350                 }
00351                 else uhh[i] = uhr[k][i][j];
00352                 ts2 = 0.5*(1.0 - uhh[i]/hvol[k][i][j]);
00353                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00354                   fluxtr[i][m] = uhh[i]*(tr[m][k][i][j] + slope[i][m]*ts2);
00355                 }
00356               }
00357             }
00358 
00359 /*   Calculate new tracer concentration in each cell after accounting */
00360 /* for the i-direction fluxes.                                        */
00361 
00362             uhr[k][X0][j] -= uhh[X0];
00363             for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00364 
00365               if ((uhh[i] != 0.0) || (uhh[i-1] != 0.0)) 
00366                 {
00367                   double hlst, Ihnew;
00368                   
00369                   uhr[k][i][j] -= uhh[i];
00370                   hlst = hvol[k][i][j];
00371 
00372                   hvol[k][i][j] -= (uhh[i] - uhh[i-1]);
00373                   Ihnew = 1.0 / hvol[k][i][j];
00374                   
00375                   for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00376                     tr[m][k][i][j] *= hlst;
00377                     tr[m][k][i][j] = (tr[m][k][i][j] - 
00378                                       (fluxtr[i][m]-fluxtr[i-1][m])) * Ihnew;
00379                   }
00380                 }
00381             }
00382 
00383           } /* j loop */
00384 
00385 /* ============================================================ */
00386 /*                      now advect meridionally                 */
00387 /* ============================================================ */
00388 
00389           for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00390 
00391 /*   Calculate the j-direction profiles (slopes) of each tracer that  */
00392 /* is being advected.                                                 */
00393 
00394             for (j=Y0;j<=ny+1;j++) {
00395               for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00396                 minslope = 4.0*((fabs(tr[m][k][i][j+1]-tr[m][k][i][j]) <
00397                                  fabs(tr[m][k][i][j]-tr[m][k][i][j-1])) ?
00398                                 (tr[m][k][i][j+1]-tr[m][k][i][j]) : 
00399                                 (tr[m][k][i][j]-tr[m][k][i][j-1]));
00400                 slope[j][m] = vmask[i][j] * vmask[i][j-1] *
00401                   (((tr[m][k][i][j+1]-tr[m][k][i][j]) *
00402                     (tr[m][k][i][j]-tr[m][k][i][j-1]) < 0.0) ? 0.0 :
00403                    ((fabs(tr[m][k][i][j+1]-tr[m][k][i][j-1])<fabs(minslope)) ?
00404                     0.5*(tr[m][k][i][j+1]-tr[m][k][i][j-1]) : 0.5*minslope));
00405               }
00406             }
00407   
00408 /*   Calculate the j-direction fluxes of each tracer, using as much   */
00409 /* the minimum of the remaining mass flux (vhr) and the half the mass */
00410 /* in the cell plus whatever part of its half of the mass flux that   */
00411 /* the flux through the other side does not require.                  */
00412 
00413             for (j=Y0;j<=ny;j++) {
00414               if (vhr[k][i][j] == 0.0) { 
00415                 vhh[j] = 0.0;
00416                 
00417                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) fluxtr[j][m] = 0.0;
00418               }
00419               else if (vhr[k][i][j] < 0.0) {
00420 
00421                 if (k==0 || k==1 ) {
00422                   hup = (hvol[k][i][j+1]-DXDYh(i,j+1)*MLMIN);
00423                 } else {
00424                   hup = (hvol[k][i][j+1]-DXDYh(i,j+1)*EPSILON);
00425                 }
00426 
00427                 hlos = D_MAX(0.0,vhr[k][i][j+1]);
00428                 
00429                 if (((hup + vhr[k][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) && 
00430                     ((0.5*hup + vhr[k][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00431                   vhh[j] = D_MIN(-0.5*hup,-hup+hlos);
00432                 }
00433                 
00434                 else vhh[j] = vhr[k][i][j];
00435                 ts2 = 0.5*(1.0 + vhh[j]/(hvol[k][i][j+1]));
00436                 
00437                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00438                   fluxtr[j][m] = vhh[j]*(tr[m][k][i][j+1] - slope[j+1][m]*ts2);
00439                 }
00440               }
00441               else {
00442 
00443                 if (k==0 || k==1 ) {
00444                   hup = (hvol[k][i][j]-DXDYh(i,j)*MLMIN);
00445                 } else {
00446                   hup = (hvol[k][i][j]-DXDYh(i,j)*EPSILON);
00447                 }
00448 
00449                 hlos = D_MAX(0.0,-vhr[k][i][j-1]);
00450                 
00451                 if (((hup - vhr[k][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) 
00452                     && ((0.5*hup - vhr[k][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00453                   vhh[j] = D_MAX(0.5*hup,hup-hlos);
00454                 }
00455                 
00456                 else vhh[j] = vhr[k][i][j];
00457                 ts2 = 0.5*(1.0 - vhh[j] / (hvol[k][i][j]));
00458                 
00459                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00460                   fluxtr[j][m] = vhh[j]*(tr[m][k][i][j] + slope[j][m]*ts2);
00461                 }
00462               }
00463             }
00464 
00465 /*   Calculate new tracer concentration in each cell after accounting */
00466 /* for the j-direction fluxes.                                        */
00467 
00468             vhr[k][i][Y0] -= vhh[Y0];
00469             for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00470               if ((vhh[j] != 0.0) || (vhh[j-1] != 0.0)) {
00471                 double hlst[NYMEM], Ihnew;
00472                 hlst[j] = hvol[k][i][j];
00473                 hvol[k][i][j] -= (vhh[j] - vhh[j-1]);
00474                 Ihnew = 1.0 / hvol[k][i][j];
00475                 vhr[k][i][j] -= vhh[j];
00476                 
00477                 for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00478                   tr[m][k][i][j] *= hlst[j];
00479                   tr[m][k][i][j] = (tr[m][k][i][j] - 
00480                                     fluxtr[j][m] + fluxtr[j-1][m]) * Ihnew;
00481                 }
00482               }
00483             }
00484           } /* i loop */
00485         }                        /* end of big loop over k              */
00486 
00487 /*      calculate new thickness field - to be used for vertical         */
00488 /*      tracer advection from updated volumes (vol + fluxes)            */
00489 
00490       for (k=0; k<=NZ-1; k++) {
00491         for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00492           for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00493             hnew[k][i][j] = hvol[k][i][j]/DXDYh(i,j);
00494             
00495             if (hnew[k][i][j] < EPSILON) {      
00496               hnew[k][i][j] = EPSILON;     
00497             }
00498             
00499           }
00500         }
00501 
00502       }
00503 /* ============================================================ */
00504 /*                      now advect vertically                   */
00505 /* ============================================================ */
00506 
00507       for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00508          for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00509 /*      work from top to bottom - by interfaces - interface k is the    */
00510 /*      interface between layer k and layer k-1. net flux at this       */
00511 /*      interface is wd[[k][i][j]= ea[k][i][j] and eb[k-1][i][j]        */
00512         
00513 /* k=0 */
00514         
00515           if (wd[0][i][j] == 0.0) {
00516             wdh[0][i][j] = 0.0;
00517           }
00518           else if (wd[0][i][j] < 0.0) {
00519             hup = hnew[0][i][j] - MLMIN;
00520             hlos = D_MAX(0.0, wd[1][i][j]);
00521             if (((hup + wd[0][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00522                 ((0.5*hup + wd[0][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00523               wdh[0][i][j] = D_MIN(-0.5*hup,-hup+hlos);
00524             }
00525             else wdh[0][i][j] = wd[0][i][j];
00526           }
00527           else {
00528             wdh[0][i][j] = wd[0][i][j];
00529           }        
00530 
00531 /* k=1 */
00532 
00533           if (wd[1][i][j] == 0.0) {
00534             wdh[1][i][j] = 0.0;
00535           }
00536           else if (wd[1][i][j] > 0.0) {
00537             hup = hnew[0][i][j] - MLMIN;
00538             hlos = D_MAX(0.0, -wd[0][i][j]);
00539             if (((hup - wd[1][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00540                 ((0.5*hup - wd[1][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00541               wdh[1][i][j] = D_MAX(0.5*hup,hup-hlos);
00542             }
00543             else wdh[1][i][j] = wd[1][i][j];
00544           }
00545           else {
00546             hup = hnew[1][i][j] - MLMIN;
00547             hlos = D_MAX(0.0,wd[2][i][j]);
00548             if (((hup + wd[1][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00549                 ((0.5*hup + wd[1][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00550               wdh[1][i][j] = D_MIN(-0.5*hup,-hup+hlos);
00551             }
00552             else wdh[1][i][j] = wd[1][i][j];
00553           }
00554 
00555 
00556 /* k=2 */
00557 
00558           if (wd[2][i][j] == 0.0) {
00559             wdh[2][i][j] = 0.0;
00560           }
00561           else if (wd[2][i][j] > 0.0) {
00562             hup = hnew[1][i][j] - MLMIN;
00563             hlos = D_MAX(0.0, -wd[1][i][j]);
00564             if (((hup - wd[2][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00565                 ((0.5*hup - wd[2][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00566               wdh[2][i][j] = D_MAX(0.5*hup,hup-hlos);
00567             }
00568             else wdh[2][i][j] = wd[2][i][j];
00569           }
00570           else {
00571             hup = hnew[2][i][j] - EPSILON;
00572             hlos = D_MAX(0.0,wd[3][i][j]);
00573             if (((hup + wd[2][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00574                 ((0.5*hup + wd[2][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00575               wdh[2][i][j] = D_MIN(-0.5*hup,-hup+hlos);
00576             }
00577             else wdh[2][i][j] = wd[2][i][j];
00578           }
00579 
00580 /* k=3 --> NZ-1 */
00581 
00582           for (k=3; k<=NZ-1; k++) {     
00583 
00584             if (wd[k][i][j] == 0.0) {
00585               wdh[k][i][j] = 0.0;
00586             }
00587             else if (wd[k][i][j] > 0.0) {
00588               hup = hnew[k-1][i][j] - EPSILON;
00589               hlos = D_MAX(0.0, -wd[k-1][i][j]);
00590               if (((hup - wd[k][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00591                   ((0.5*hup - wd[k][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00592                 wdh[k][i][j] = D_MAX(0.5*hup,hup-hlos);
00593               }
00594               else wdh[k][i][j] = wd[k][i][j];
00595             }
00596             else {
00597               hup = hnew[k][i][j] - EPSILON;
00598               if (k != NZ-1) {
00599                 hlos = D_MAX(0.0,wd[k+1][i][j]);
00600               } else {
00601                 hlos = 0.0;
00602               }
00603               if (((hup + wd[k][i][j] - hlos) < 0.0) &&
00604                   ((0.5*hup + wd[k][i][j]) < 0.0)) {
00605                 wdh[k][i][j] = D_MIN(-0.5*hup,-hup+hlos);
00606               }
00607               else wdh[k][i][j] = wd[k][i][j];
00608             }
00609             
00610           } /* k */
00611         }   /* j */
00612       }     /* i */
00613 
00614       for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++)
00615           for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00616               ear[0][i][j] = wdh[0][i][j];
00617               /* added by Curtis - bottom ebr wasn't set anywhere else */
00618               ebr[NZ-1][i][j] = 0;  
00619           }
00620 
00621       for (k=1;k<=NZ-1;k++) { 
00622           for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00623               for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {  
00624                   ear[k][i][j] =   0.5 * (fabs(wdh[k][i][j]) + wdh[k][i][j]);
00625                   ebr[k-1][i][j] = 0.5 * (fabs(wdh[k][i][j]) - wdh[k][i][j]);
00626               }
00627           }
00628       }     
00629  
00630 
00631       for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00632           for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00633               hnew0[i] = hnew[0][i][j];
00634               bet[i]=1.0/(hnew[0][i][j] + ebr[0][i][j] + wdh[0][i][j]);
00635 
00636               for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00637                   tr[m][0][i][j] = bet[i]*(hnew0[i]*tr[m][0][i][j]);
00638           }
00639 
00640 
00641           for (k=1;k<=NZ-1;k++) {
00642               for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00643                   gam[k][i] = ebr[k-1][i][j] * bet[i];
00644 
00645                   bet[i]=1.0/(hnew[k][i][j] + ebr[k][i][j] +
00646                               (1.0-gam[k][i])*ear[k][i][j]);
00647                   
00648                   for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00649                       tr[m][k][i][j] = bet[i] * (hnew[k][i][j]*tr[m][k][i][j] +
00650                                                  ear[k][i][j]*(tr[m][k-1][i][j]) );
00651               }       
00652           }
00653           for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00654               for (k=NZ-2;k>=0;k--) {
00655                   for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00656                       tr[m][k][i][j] += gam[k+1][i]*tr[m][k+1][i][j];
00657                   }}
00658       } /*j*/
00659 
00660 /* update hvol with diapycnal fluxes */
00661 
00662       for (k=0;k<NZ-1;k++)
00663           for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++)
00664               for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++)
00665                   hnew[k][i][j] += (wdh[k][i][j] - wdh[k+1][i][j]);
00666 
00667       for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++)
00668           for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++)
00669               hnew[NZ-1][i][j] += wdh[NZ-1][i][j];
00670 
00671       for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++)
00672           for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++)
00673               for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00674                   if (hnew[k][i][j] < EPSILON) hnew[k][i][j] = EPSILON;
00675                   hvol[k][i][j] = DXDYh(i,j)*hnew[k][i][j];
00676 
00677                   if ( wd[k][i][j] > 0.0 && ( wdh[k][i][j] > wd[k][i][j] ))
00678                       printf("case 1 wdh[k]\n");
00679 
00680                   else if ( wd[k][i][j] < 0.0 && ( wdh[k][i][j] < wd[k][i][j] ))
00681                       printf("case 2 wdh[k]\n");
00682                   wd[k][i][j] -= wdh[k][i][j];  
00683               }
00684 #else  /* STANDARD_ADVECTION */
00685       /* big loop over k         */
00686 //      printf("phos(%d,%d,%d)=%g,uhtm=%g\n",0,190,26,tr[mPHOSPHATE][0][190][26],
00687 //                   uhtm[0][190][26]);
00688 //      exit(1);
00689       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00690         // first advect zonally
00691         for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00692           for (i=X0;i<=nx+1;i++) {
00693             for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00694               //              fluxtr[i][m] = uhtm[i]*(tr[m][k][i][j]);
00695             }
00696           }
00697         }
00698 
00699         // now advect meridionally
00700         for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00701 
00702         }
00703       } /* end of big loop over k */
00704 
00705       /*  calculate new thickness field - to be used for vertical  */
00706       /*  tracer advection from updated volumes (vol + fluxes)     */
00707         
00708       for (k=0; k<=NZ-1; k++) {
00709         for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00710           for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00711             hnew[k][i][j] = hvol[k][i][j]/DXDYh(i,j);
00712             if (hnew[k][i][j] < EPSILON) hnew[k][i][j] = EPSILON;     
00713           }
00714         }
00715       }
00716 
00717       // now advect vertically
00718       for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00719         for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00720           
00721         }
00722       }
00723 
00724 
00725 #endif /* STANDARD_ADVECTION */
00726 
00727 
00728       /* zonal re-entrance */
00729 
00730     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00731       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00732     
00733         uhr[k][nx+1][j] = uhr[k][2][j];
00734         uhr[k][nx+2][j] = uhr[k][3][j];
00735         uhr[k][0][j]    = uhr[k][nx-1][j];
00736         uhr[k][1][j]    = uhr[k][nx][j];
00737 
00738         vhr[k][nx+1][j] = vhr[k][2][j];
00739         vhr[k][nx+2][j] = vhr[k][3][j];
00740         vhr[k][0][j]    = vhr[k][nx-1][j];
00741         vhr[k][1][j]    = vhr[k][nx][j];
00742 
00743         hvol[k][nx+1][j] = hvol[k][2][j];
00744         hvol[k][nx+2][j] = hvol[k][3][j];
00745         hvol[k][0][j]    = hvol[k][nx-1][j];
00746         hvol[k][1][j]    = hvol[k][nx][j];
00747 
00748         for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00749           tr[m][k][nx+1][j] = tr[m][k][2][j];
00750           tr[m][k][nx+2][j] = tr[m][k][3][j];
00751           tr[m][k][0][j]    = tr[m][k][nx-1][j];
00752           tr[m][k][1][j]    = tr[m][k][nx][j];
00753         }
00754 
00755       }
00756     }
00757                         /* meridional re-entrance */
00758 
00759         /* meridional re-entrance            */
00760 
00761     for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
00762       int ii = 363 - i;
00763       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00764         uhr[k][ii][ny+1] = (-1)*uhr[k][i][ny];
00765         uhr[k][ii][ny+2] = (-1)*uhr[k][i][ny-1];
00766 
00767         vhr[k][ii][ny+1] = (-1)*vhr[k][i][ny];
00768         vhr[k][ii][ny+2] = (-1)*vhr[k][i][ny-1];
00769 
00770         hvol[k][ii][ny+1] = hvol[k][i][ny];
00771         hvol[k][ii][ny+2] = hvol[k][i][ny-1];
00772   
00773         for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
00774           tr[m][k][ii][ny+1] = tr[m][k][i][ny];
00775           tr[m][k][ii][ny+2] = tr[m][k][i][ny-1];
00776         }
00777 
00778       }
00779     }
00780 
00781 #ifdef STANDARD_ADVECTION
00782 # ifdef WRTTS
00783       printf("itt = %i\n",itt);
00784       wrts = (double)(itts)+(double)(itt)/11.+0.0001;
00785       write_ts(wrts);
00786 # endif   // WRTTS
00787 
00788     }  /* end of temp itt iteration loop */
00789 #endif
00790     fract1 = (double)(NTSTEP-itts) / (double)NTSTEP;
00791     fract2 = 1.0 - fract1;
00792     for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) {
00793         for (i=X1; i<=nx; i++) {
00794             for (j=Y1; j<=ny; j++) {
00795 # ifdef USE_CALC_H
00796                 h[k][i][j] = hnew[k][i][j];
00797                 if (h[k][i][j] < 0.0)
00798                   printf("tracadv l 796 - h[%d][%d][%d] = %g\n", k,i,j,
00799                          h[k][i][j]);    
00800 # else
00801                 h[k][i][j] = fract1*hstart[k][i][j] + fract2*hend[k][i][j];
00802 //BX            h[k][i][j] = hend[k][i][j];
00803 # endif
00804 #ifdef HTEST
00805                 htest[k][i][j] = hnew[k][i][j]; 
00806                 printf("htest(%d,%d,%d)=%g,hend=%g\n",
00807                        k,i,j,
00808 //              htest[k][i][j] = h[k][i][j];
00809 #endif
00810             }
00811         }
00812     }
00813 
00814     //HF
00815     //  zonal re-entrance
00816     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00817       for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00818         h[k][nx+1][j] = h[k][2][j];
00819         h[k][nx+2][j] = h[k][3][j];
00820         h[k][0][j] =   h[k][nx-1][j];
00821         h[k][1][j] =   h[k][nx][j];
00822       }
00823     }
00824 
00825     //      meridional re-entrance
00826     for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
00827       int ii = 363 - i;
00828       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00829         h[k][ii][ny+1] = h[k][i][ny];
00830         h[k][ii][ny+2]   = h[k][i][ny-1];
00831       }
00832     }
00833     //HF-e
00834 
00835 # ifdef WRTTS
00836       printf("End of tracadv\n");
00837       wrts = (double)(itts)+(double)(itt)/11.+0.0005;
00838       write_ts(wrts);
00839 # endif   // WRTTS
00840 
00841 #ifdef DIFFUSE_TRACER
00842   if ((KD>0.0) || (KDML>0.0)) {
00843     diffuse_tracer();        
00844      }
00845 #endif
00846 
00847      
00848   pstage=4;
00849   print_tr(pstage);
00850 
00851   if ((KHTR>0.0)) {
00852     tracer_hordiff();
00853   }
00854   
00855   pstage=5;
00856   print_tr(pstage);
00857 
00858   free3d(hvol, NZ);
00859   free3d(uhr, NZ);
00860   free3d(vhr, NZ);
00861   free3d(ear, NZ);
00862   free3d(ebr, NZ);
00863   free3d(wdh, NZ);
00864 #if !defined AGE2 && !defined AGE3
00865   free3d(hnew, NZ);
00866 #endif
00867 }
00868 
00869 #ifdef DIFFUSE_TRACER
00870 static void diffuse_tracer()
00871 {
00872 #if (NZ>1)
00873 /*    This subroutine does a fully implicit vertical diffusion        */
00874 /*  of tracer.  Insulating top and bottom b.c.s are used.             */
00875 
00876   double a[NZ+1][NYMEM];   /* a is the coupling coefficient across an */
00877                            /* interface time integrated over dt, in m.*/
00878                            /* a times the tracer difference gives the */
00879                            /* tracer flux across an interface.        */
00880   double bet[NYMEM];       /* bet and gam are variables used by the   */
00881   double gam[NZ][NYMEM];   /* tridiagonal solver.                     */
00882 
00883   double z[NYMEM];         /* The distance from the top, normalized   */
00884                            /* by HMIX, nondimensional.                */
00885   double I_HMIX = 1.0/HMIX;
00886   double C2dtKD, C2dtKDML;
00887 
00888   int i, j, k, m;
00889 
00890   C2dtKD = 2.0*KD*dt; C2dtKDML = 2.0*KDML*dt;
00891 
00892         printf("DIFFUSING TRACER - diapycnal\n");
00893 
00894   for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00895 /*    The following loops calculates the diffusive coupling between   */
00896 /*  layers.  Without BULKMIXEDLAYER, elevated diffusion is assumed    */
00897 /*  within HMIX of the surface.                                       */
00898 /*  This is tridag, from Numerical Recipes in C.                      */
00899 
00900     for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00901 #ifdef BULKMIXEDLAYER
00902       a[1][j] = -C2dtKD / (h[1][i][j] + h[0][i][j]);
00903 #else
00904       z[j] = h[0][i][j]*I_HMIX;
00905       a[1][j] = -C2dtKD - C2dtKDML / 
00906                 ((h[1][i][j] + h[0][i][j]) *
00907                  (1.0 + 0.09*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]));
00908 #endif
00909       bet[j]=1.0/(h[0][i][j]-a[1][j]);
00910 
00911       for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00912         tr[m][0][i][j] = bet[j] * h[0][i][j] * tr[m][0][i][j];
00913     }
00914     for (k=1;k<=NZ-2;k++) {
00915       for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00916 #ifdef BULKMIXEDLAYER
00917         a[k+1][j] = -C2dtKD / (h[k+1][i][j] + h[k][i][j]);
00918 #else
00919         z[j] += h[k][i][j]*I_HMIX;
00920         a[k+1][j] = -C2dtKD - C2dtKDML / 
00921                   ((h[k+1][i][j] + h[k][i][j]) *
00922                    (1.0 + 0.09*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]));
00923 /* (           (1.0 + 0.05*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j]*z[j])); */
00924 #endif
00925         gam[k][j]=a[k][j]*bet[j];
00926         bet[j]=1.0/(h[k][i][j] - a[k+1][j] - a[k][j]*(1.0+gam[k][j]));
00927 
00928         for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00929           tr[m][k][i][j]=(h[k][i][j]*tr[m][k][i][j] - 
00930                           a[k][j]*tr[m][k-1][i][j])*bet[j];
00931       }
00932     }
00933     for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00934       gam[NZ-1][j]=a[NZ-1][j]*bet[j];
00935       bet[j]=1.0/(h[NZ-1][i][j] - a[NZ-1][j]*(1.0+gam[k][j]));
00936 
00937       for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00938         tr[m][NZ-1][i][j]=(h[NZ-1][i][j]*tr[m][NZ-1][i][j] - 
00939                            a[NZ-1][j]*tr[m][NZ-2][i][j])*bet[j];
00940     }
00941     for (k=(NZ-2);k>=0;k--) {
00942       for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00943 
00944         for (m=0;m<NTR;m++)
00945           tr[m][k][i][j] -= gam[k+1][j]*tr[m][k+1][i][j];
00946       }
00947     }
00948 
00949   }
00950 
00951 #endif /* NZ>1 */
00952 }
00953 #endif /* DIFFUSE_TRACER */
00954 
00955 
00956 static void tracer_hordiff(void)
00957 {
00958 
00959 /*   This subroutine does along-coordinate diffusion of all tracers,  */
00960 /*  using the diffusivity KHTR.  Multiple iterations are  used (if    */
00961 /*  necessary) so that there is no limit on the acceptable time       */
00962 /*  increment.                                                        */
00963 
00964   double khdt_rem_x[NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* The value of KHTR*dt which must */
00965                                 /* be accomodated by later iterations */
00966                                 /* in the zonal direction, in m2.     */
00967   double khdt_rem_y[NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* The value of KHTR*dt which must */
00968                                 /* be accomodated by later iterations */
00969                                 /* in the meridional direction, in m2.*/
00970   double Coef_x[NXMEM][NYMEM];  /* The coefficient relating zonal     */
00971                                 /* tracer differences to fluxes, m3.  */
00972   double Coef_y[NXMEM][NYMEM];  /* The coefficient relating meridional*/
00973                                 /* tracer differences to fluxes, m3.  */
00974   double Ihdxdy[NXMEM][NYMEM];  /* The inverse of the volume of fluid */
00975                                 /* in a layer in a grid cell, m-3.    */
00976   double dTr[NXMEM][NYMEM];     /* The change in a tracer's concen-   */
00977                                 /* tration, in units of concentration.*/
00978   static double Max_khdt_x[NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* The maximum value of     */
00979                                 /* KHTR*dt which can be stably accom- */
00980                                 /* odated within a single iteration in*/
00981                                 /* the zonal-direction, in m2.        */
00982   static double Max_khdt_y[NXMEM][NYMEM]; /* The maximum value of     */
00983                                 /* KHTR*dt which can be stably accom- */
00984                                 /* odated within a single iteration in*/
00985                                 /* the meridional-direction, in m2.   */
00986 
00987   extern double umask[NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* _mask are 1 over ocean and 0  */
00988   extern double vmask[NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* over land on the u & v grids. */
00989 
00990   static int zero_if_first_call = 0;
00991   int i, j, k, m, domore_k, itt;
00992 
00993   printf("DIFFUSING TRACER - isopycnal\n");
00994 
00995   if (zero_if_first_call == 0) {
00996     for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00997       for (i=X0;i<=nx;i++) {
00998               Max_khdt_x[i][j] = 0.125 / (DYu(i,j) * IDXu(i,j) *
00999            ((IDXDYh(i,j)>IDXDYh(i+1,j)) ? IDXDYh(i,j) : IDXDYh(i+1,j)));
01000           }
01001       }
01002       for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01003           for (j=Y0;j<=ny;j++) {
01004               Max_khdt_y[i][j] = 0.125 / (DXv(i,j) * IDYv(i,j) *
01005               ((IDXDYh(i,j)>IDXDYh(i,j+1)) ? IDXDYh(i,j) : IDXDYh(i,j+1)));
01006           }
01007       }
01008     zero_if_first_call = 1;
01009   }
01010 
01011 
01012   for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01013 
01014       for (i=X0;i<=nx;i++) {
01015           for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
01016               khdt_rem_x[i][j] = dt*KHTR*DYu(i,j)*IDXu(i,j)*umask[i][j];
01017           }
01018       }
01019       for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01020           for (j=Y0;j<=ny;j++) {
01021               khdt_rem_y[i][j] = dt*KHTR*DXv(i,j)*IDYv(i,j)*vmask[i][j];
01022           }
01023       }
01024 
01025 
01026     itt = 0; domore_k = 1;
01027     while (domore_k) {
01028       domore_k = 0; itt++;
01029 
01030       for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01031           for (j=Y0;j<=ny;j++) {
01032           double C0;  /* A work variable with units of m2. */
01033           if (khdt_rem_y[i][j] < Max_khdt_y[i][j]) C0 = khdt_rem_y[i][j];
01034           else {C0 = Max_khdt_y[i][j]; domore_k++;}
01035           khdt_rem_y[i][j] -= C0;
01036          Coef_y[i][j] = C0*2.0*h[k][i][j]*h[k][i][j+1] /
01037             (h[k][i][j]+h[k][i][j+1]);
01038         }
01039       }
01040 
01041       for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
01042         for (i=X0;i<=nx;i++) {
01043           double C0;  /* A work variable with units of m2. */
01044           if (khdt_rem_x[i][j] < Max_khdt_x[i][j]) C0 = khdt_rem_x[i][j];
01045           else {C0 = Max_khdt_x[i][j]; domore_k++;}
01046           khdt_rem_x[i][j] -= C0;
01047           Coef_x[i][j] = C0*2.0*h[k][i][j]*h[k][i+1][j] /
01048             (h[k][i][j]+h[k][i+1][j]);
01049         }
01050         for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) Ihdxdy[i][j] = IDXDYh(i,j) / h[k][i][j];
01051       }
01052     
01053       for (m=0;m<NTR;m++) {
01054 //BX-a
01055 //BX   add re-entrace values here
01056                 /* zonal re-entrance            */
01057 
01058           for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01059               tr[m][k][nx+1][j] = tr[m][k][2][j];
01060               tr[m][k][nx+2][j] = tr[m][k][3][j];
01061               tr[m][k][0][j]    = tr[m][k][nx-1][j];
01062               tr[m][k][1][j]    = tr[m][k][nx][j];
01063               Coef_x[nx+1][j] = Coef_x[2][j];
01064               Coef_x[nx+2][j] = Coef_x[3][j];
01065               Coef_x[0][j]    = Coef_x[nx-1][j];
01066               Coef_x[1][j]    = Coef_x[nx][j];
01067               Coef_y[nx+1][j] = Coef_y[2][j];
01068               Coef_y[nx+2][j] = Coef_y[3][j];
01069               Coef_y[0][j]    = Coef_y[nx-1][j];
01070               Coef_y[1][j]    = Coef_y[nx][j];
01071 /*            Ihdxdy[nx+1][j] = Ihdxdy[2][j];
01072               Ihdxdy[nx+2][j] = Ihdxdy[3][j];
01073               Ihdxdy[0][j]    = Ihdxdy[nx-1][j];
01074               Ihdxdy[1][j]    = Ihdxdy[nx][j];    */
01075           }
01076           
01077           /* meridional re-entrance            */
01078 
01079           for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01080               int ii = 363 - i;
01081               tr[m][k][ii][ny+1] = tr[m][k][i][ny];
01082               tr[m][k][ii][ny+2] = tr[m][k][i][ny-1];
01083               Coef_x[ii][ny+1] = Coef_x[i][ny];
01084               Coef_x[ii][ny+2] = Coef_x[i][ny-1];
01085               Coef_y[ii][ny+1] = Coef_y[i][ny];
01086               Coef_y[ii][ny+2] = Coef_y[i][ny-1];
01087 //            Ihdxdy[ii][ny+1] = Ihdxdy[i][ny];
01088 //            Ihdxdy[ii][ny+2] = Ihdxdy[i][ny-1];
01089           }
01090 //BX-e
01091           for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01092               for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
01093                   dTr[i][j] = Ihdxdy[i][j] *
01094                       (Coef_x[i-1][j] * (tr[m][k][i-1][j] - tr[m][k][i][j]) -
01095                        Coef_x[i][j] *   (tr[m][k][i][j]   - tr[m][k][i+1][j]) +
01096                        Coef_y[i][j-1] * (tr[m][k][i][j-1] - tr[m][k][i][j]) -
01097                        Coef_y[i][j] *   (tr[m][k][i][j]   - tr[m][k][i][j+1]));
01098               }
01099           }
01100 
01101           for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++)
01102               for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) 
01103                   tr[m][k][i][j] += dTr[i][j];
01104 
01105 //BX-a
01106 //BX   add re-entrace values when iteration loop is done here
01107                 /* zonal re-entrance            */
01108           
01109           if (itt > 10) {
01110               for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01111                   tr[m][k][nx+1][j] = tr[m][k][2][j];
01112                   tr[m][k][nx+2][j] = tr[m][k][3][j];
01113                   tr[m][k][0][j]    = tr[m][k][nx-1][j];
01114                   tr[m][k][1][j]    = tr[m][k][nx][j];
01115               }
01116               
01117               /* meridional re-entrance            */
01118             
01119               for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01120                   int ii = 363 - i;
01121                   tr[m][k][ii][ny+1] = tr[m][k][i][ny];
01122                   tr[m][k][ii][ny+2] = tr[m][k][i][ny-1];
01123               }
01124           }
01125 //BX-e
01126       }
01127       
01128       if (itt > 10) {
01129         domore_k = 0;       /* break loop */
01130       }
01131 
01132     }  /* end while */
01133     
01134   } /* end k loop */
01135   
01136 } /* end of subroutine */
01137 
01138 void print_tr(int pstage){
01139 
01140   int printwarning=1;
01141   
01142   if (printwarning == 1) {
01143 //    printf("tracadv.c: BEGIN PRINT STAGE # %i \n", pstage);
01144   }
01145   
01146 }

01149 //BX for debugging
01150 //BX void hvol_integral(void){
01151 void hvol_integral(double ***hvol){
01152     
01153   int i, j, k;
01154 
01155   hvolint=0.e0;
01156   for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01157       for (i=2;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
01158           for (j=2;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01159               if (hvol[k][i][j] > 1e-6) {
01160                   //BX            hvolint += h[k][i][j] * dxdyh[i][j];
01161                   hvolint += hvol[k][i][j];
01162               }
01163           }
01164       }
01165   }
01166 
01167 }
01168 void hvol_kintegral(int k, double ***hvol){
01169     
01170   int i, j;
01171 
01172   hvolint=0.e0;
01173   for (i=2;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
01174       for (j=2;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01175           //BX if (h[k][i][j] > 1e-6) {
01176               //BX            hvolint += h[k][i][j] * dxdyh[i][j];
01177               hvolint += hvol[k][i][j];
01178               //BX }
01179       }
01180   }
01181 
01182 }
01183 
01184 //BX tracer_integral is calculated in step.c
01185 
01186 void tracer_kintegral(int trnum, int k, double ***hvol){
01187     
01188   int i, j;
01189 
01190   trintegral[trnum]=0.e0;
01191   for (i=2;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
01192       for (j=2;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01193           //BX if (h[k][i][j] > 1e-6) {
01194               //BX            trintegral[trnum] += tr[trnum][k][i][j] * h[k][i][j] * dxdyh[i][j];
01195              trintegral[trnum] += tr[trnum][k][i][j] * hvol[k][i][j];
01196              //BX }
01197       }
01198   }
01199 
01200 }
